parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post does not contain a CMF number. While the absence of a CMF number is not definitive proof that the post is not electoral propaganda, it is a factor to consider.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "AUR" (Alianța pentru Unirea Românilor), a parliamentary candidate.  The text "Votăm AUR" directly advocates for voting for this party. This strongly suggests that "Article 36 (7) - a" applies.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The post's message is not a private communication; it aims for broad dissemination. Therefore, it addresses the wide population.  "Article 36 (7) - c" is potentially applicable.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support AUR in the parliamentary elections. The phrase "Votăm AUR" leaves no doubt about its intention to influence voting behavior. This clearly satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks any journalistic elements. It does not present news, analysis, or opinions; instead, it directly promotes a specific political party. It does not adhere to journalistic standards of objectivity and neutrality.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post is not expressing a personal opinion; it's a clear call to action to vote for a specific party.  It's not a personal opinion disguised as a political statement.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>967965638717422</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers directly to a specific parliamentary candidate (AUR), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to choose AUR. The content is not journalistic or a personal opinion; it's a direct endorsement.  The post's timing is crucial; even if the exact date isn't specified, the context strongly suggests it's related to the parliamentary elections. The ad library data shows a significant spend (RON300-RON399) and a substantial reach (100K-500K).
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Alianța pentru Unirea Românilor (AUR)</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Ciprian Paraschiv</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Ciprian Paraschiv, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 967965638717422), după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează explicit partidul AUR, îndemnând la votul pentru acesta cu fraza "Votăm AUR", având un efect electoral clar de influențare a votanților în favoarea AUR. Reclama, cu o cheltuială de RON300-RON399 și o estimare a audienței de 100.000-500.000 persoane,  îndeplinește toate criteriile propagandei electorale conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGEA nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006,  nefiind jurnalism sau opinie personală, ci o susținere directă a unui candidat electoral.  Datele de contact ale advertiserului sunt partidauriasi@gmail.com și +40742353934.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
